author: Filmento
description:
Upgrade your workspace with Flexispot during their Fall sale! Use my code C730 to save $30 on the C7Max chair: https://bit.ly/4mZgsy9 -us  https://bit.ly/3WzUCWX -ca

Prince of Persia: Sands of Time is a 2010 adaptation of the video game franchise that was supposed to launch a movie franchise. But it didn't. It flopped and was forgotten by everybody. Which is curious because it's not a terrible movie like we often see today. It's just... nothing. So let's find out what happened.

title: Prince of Persia – A Cinematic Flop Forgotten in Time | Anatomy of a Failure
